subject: I got some Birthday wishes from the other side !!!
author: Ralph Smith
full_text:
Hi all,

 Just wanted to say I got up today and just turned on the RS 20-125 
and heard some of them saying " Happy Birthday " to me and it is my 
birthday I was shocked to hear that LOL. I also heard someone in the 
background singing " Happy Birthday " too. How cool is that, no 
coincidence seems like to me. Here is another story I was watching TV 
the Grammy Awards and when Little Richard and Jerry lee Lewis was on 
there was another singer with them from Credence Clearwater Revival I 
couldn't remember his name. So as I was listening to the spirits I 
heard a voice today say " John Fogerty " is that his name I think it 
is? How cool was that ? Oh well just some stuff to ponder on. You all 
have a great evening.

Regards,

Ralph the Ghost Hunter
